caption.title: Epidemic flow and model parameters.
caption.p: A Schematic representation of the infection transmission process. S H, L H, I H, and R H represent susceptible, latent, infectious, and recovered human hosts, respectively; S V, L V, and I V represent susceptible, latent, and infectious mosquitoes, respectively; parameters are described in panel B. B Description of model parameters and values used in the simulations.
